title: Events
About Us
text: To advance knowledge and expand capacity in the field of infectious disease modelling and data analytics, by collaborating, innovating, and training, with the goal of being prepared for pandemics in the Netherlands.

title: About Us
text: To advance knowledge and expand capacity in the field of infectious disease modelling and data analytics, by collaborating, innovating, and training, with the goal of being prepared for pandemics in the Netherlands.

title: About Us
text:
Our Vision

Train and expand capacity by empowering a next generation of researchers to fulfill their professional potential in infectious disease modelling and data analytics in a setting that is welcoming and inclusive.
Create a professional network with connections between and among different scientific disciplines to share and exchange knowledge, to innovate, and to accelerate progress in the science behind controlling the spread of infections and develop visibility of the field.
Support infrastructure and coordinate a dynamic capacity dedicated to collaboration, innovative research, teaching, mentoring such as to be prepared for trusted advice, in a transparent way, for policy makers in the field of infectious disease control during times of crisis.

title: Collaborative Dutch Epidemic Modelling and Data Analytics Platform (CODEMAP)
